text:
I recently ordered a takeaway pizza from Hougang Green Pizza Hut, and overall, it was a satisfying experience. The ordering process was smooth and the estimated wait time was accurate. The staff were polite and efficient when I picked up my order, which was ready on time and still piping hot.

The pizza itself was delicious. The crust was perfectly baked—crispy on the outside yet soft and airy inside. The toppings were fresh and generously spread, and the cheese had that perfect gooey stretch. I especially appreciated the balance of flavors; the sauce had a nice tang, and the seasoning was just right.

One small downside was that the packaging could have been better. Some condensation built up inside the box, making a few slices slightly soggy. However, this didn’t take away too much from the overall taste and quality.

For the price, the portion size was fair, and the value for money was great. I would definitely order from here again and would recommend it to anyone looking for a tasty and reliable pizza takeaway.
We were served by  Ms. Nisa today. Very pleasant, customer friendly attitude. We were served the pizza within 10 mins..
The pizza is so nice, the staffs also are friendly, high recommend for everyone☺️

I ordered from this store and had a great experience! This outlet is for takeaway and delivery only, so no dine-in. Ordered in-store, and the staff was friendly and efficient. My food was prepared quickly and packed well. The pizza was hot, fresh, and super tasty—crispy crust, cheesy, and loaded with toppings. A great place to grab a quick meal on the go or order for delivery. Will definitely be back!

Absolutely fantastic pizza at this Hougang gem! The crust was perfectly crispy, the toppings were fresh and flavorful, and the service was top-notch. A definite 5-star experience and the best pizza I've had in the area. Highly recommend!
